channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Lourdes Pilgrimage Deacon, Dan Revetto talks about his experiences at Our Lady of Lourdes Shrine in France, and how his calling to the Deaconate has been enhanced by the people he?s met and the experiences he?s had there. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Conversation With Francis On Vices And Virtues
channel.desc: Pope Francis? reflections on vices and virtues springing from the inspiration of Giotto?s stunning frescoes in the Scrovegni Chapel in Padua, Italy. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the second step of the Examen, Petition when one asks God for insight and strength that will make the examen a work of grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Marvelous Gift
channel.desc: Accompany Thomas, a teen who found refuge in his room playing videogames, as he joins a group of young Catholics preparing for Confirmation, and unexpectedly grows in his Faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mass For The Repose Of The Soul Of Pope Francis (irondale)
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels in Irondale, Alabama, the Holy Mass for the Repose of the Soul of Pope Francis. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Highway To Heaven Carlo Acutis And The Eucharist
channel.desc: Carlo Acutis? biographer and others share personal stories of his extraordinary love, reverence and devotion to the Real Presence of Jesus in the Eucharist, and his deep devotion to Our Blessed Mother Mary. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Theology Of The Body For Teens
channel.desc: A look at the specific challenges that boys and girls face in an effort to remain pure while dating. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe talks more about a new book that captures Mother Angelica?s one-of-a-kind wit, wisdom, and indefatigable spirit that led many hearts and souls to God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: An interview with Fr. David O?Connor, whose missionary journey has taken him to the remote villages of the Peruvian Andes where he sees the fruits of his ministry in the people. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: The Blessed Virgin Mary gives birth to the world?s Redeemer in Bethlehem in the Third Joyful Mystery. In Jesus Christ, God became man and transformed our planet into a star of salvation, a process that still continues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: Bernadette and her friends went out to gather firewood, but found something of far greater value, a true understanding of their faith through a special encounter with ?The Immaculate Conception.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Tyburn Convent Gloria Deo
channel.desc: The heritage and history of the Tyburn Nuns in England, including their various monasteries throughout the world. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan invites NFL wide receiver Chris Horn to discuss how his Catholic faith played a large role in his career and how his faith remains front-and-center in his life after football. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Mass For The Repose Of The Soul Of Pope Francis (irondale)
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels in Irondale, Alabama, the Holy Mass for the Repose of the Soul of Pope Francis. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: (30 minutes).

channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.title: new! Novena Of Masses For The Holy Father
channel.desc: On the eighth day of the Novendiales, join in prayer as the Church mourns the death of the Holy Father, Pope Francis. (180 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on some of the writings of Fr. Frederick William Faber of England concerning the Blessed Sacrament and some of the devotions we have - 40 Hours, Perpetual Adoration, visits. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: L'ukraine: La Sortie Des Caracombes
channel.desc: The program considers the history, suffering and present day revival of the Ukrainian Greek Catholic Church. With unique archive material sourced from the Russian State Television, the documentary considers the early the Greek Catholic Church, reviewing how at the Pseudo-Synod of 1946, the Greek Catholic Church was officially dissolved with its Churches and liturgical treasures handed over the Orthodox Church in Ukraine. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mass For The Repose Of The Soul Of Pope Francis (irondale)
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels in Irondale, Alabama, the Holy Mass for the Repose of the Soul of Pope Francis. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Hear the inspiring story of a woman who overcame sexual abuse, her family?s secretive cult involvement, and turbulent childhood, to paint Catholic Icons and com home to the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother explains how Jesus loved us before we even knew him. She proposes the question, "What does it mean to know Jesus?". (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Archbishop Fulton J. Sheen Servant Of All
channel.desc: The personal story of Archbishop Fulton Sheen, one of the most influential voices of the 20th Century, who reached millions of viewers a week on his television show ?Life is Worth Living,? and his writings captured over 100 publications. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: The challenges are many in India, the world?s most populous country, where Christians make up less than 5% of the population, and the caste system although outlawed, still remains. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Choices We Face
channel.desc: At the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally, hear Fr. Mathias Thelen proclaim the reasons why following Jesus is always worth the risk. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother describes how each of us is called to be holy but remain human. She delves into the Old Testament for Elias running in fear of Jezebel and brings in St. Paul and his preaching. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy looks at how Blessed Mother Teresa of Calcutta dealt with suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Learn about a technique to help parents teach lasting lessons to quarreling siblings. Plus, HeartBeat International?s director outlines her approach to transforming relationships. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Dr. Benjamin Wiker moderates a heated debate between St. Thomas More and King Henry VIII as the saint continues to plead for the King to see sense, for the sake of their beloved country and his soul. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug prepares the fresh catch of the day while relating all the biblical connections for seafood in the Bible and the early Christian Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Explore the complex and often misunderstood topic of despair with Fr. Nick Monco as he discusses its causes, effects and the times when it may or may not be sinful. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen discusses three characteristics where man is at war with himself: what he pretends to be, hatred of others and hostility towards religion. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer continues his discussion of the "Four Levels of Success" and the impact the levels can have on personal and professional lives. Level four comes with a surrender to God in the form of a "Thy will be done" perspective. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Using real life experiences, Fr. Gallagher explains the methodology behind St. Ignatius? teaching on the discernment of spirits, both good and evil, as well as states of consolation and desolation. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: On today?s program, Fr. Groeschel discusses the meaning of the Mass, comparing the current service to the way it was celebrated in the early Church. He also explores what the Eucharist means for the faithful. (25 minutes).
